species.name: gossifleur
descriptions: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.
